attributes.action: Hold a fast, full and public investigation into Russian interference in Brexit
attributes.additional_details: It appears that Russia may have heavily influenced the most important event in United Kingdom politics in a generation.  This may have materially undermined our democracy.  Until it is clear whether there was involvement, and how significant, faith in our democracy is for many broken.  This is the only way to start the healing process.
attributes.background: Hold a fast, full and public independent investigation into Russian interference in Brexit in areas such as funding, media and social media. This should include the extent of involvement, who was involved, who was aware of it and to what extent it influenced the outcome of the vote.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open on this topic, which you might like to sign:

Order an official probe into potential Russian interference in the EU referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609417
